original_text: He bears witness to what he has seen and heard, yet no one receives his testimony.
korean_text: 그가 친히 보고 들은 것을 증언하되 그의 증언을 받는 자가 없도다

sentences.original_text: He bears witness to what he has seen and heard
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자기가 본 것과 들은 것을 증거합니다

sentences.original_text: yet no one receives his testimony
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 아무도 그의 증거를 받지 않습니다
